titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-05-03 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 3, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys (including Howdy Forrester, June Webb, Bashful Brother Oswald, and Jimmy Riddle), guest performer Benny Martin, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, June Carter, and Pap's Jug Band. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 969th broadcast.

subject.topic: United States. Armed Forces Radio Service
